name: AeroKnife
description:
A quick paced arcade game where players steer an arrow through procedurally generated stages, fighting enemies by cutting through enemy weak points while avoiding enemy strong points.

Map generation & Room transitions by Max Cohen (@uugr on itch.io)

A project I worked on over the summer of 2022.

I would like to develop this game further, but will likely not have the time, so I am releasing it as a prototype for now.
